description: Detects whether a provided text contains instances of explicit reasoning
prompt_template:
lambda x: f"""{metaprocess_headers["agipy"]}
    >>> from agipy import detect_reasoning
    >>> # detect_reasoning returns True if the text contains explicit reasoning in some form, False otherwise
    >>> detect_reasoning(\"\"\"
{x}
\"\"\")
    """
output_transform: lambda x: get_judgement_probability(x, yes_tokens=["True", " True"], no_tokens=["False", " False"])*.9876815141*2-1
